overview: High school can be tough, especially when you have a disorder that limits you from doing almost anything. Kendall Elizabeth Katrine (Jordan-Paige Sudduth) has gone through a lot of her life with her best friend, Zander Cordova (Cobin Bugni), by her side. He’s stuck by her through thick and thin. Whether she's at school or in the hospital, he's there. But when Zander starts to go off the wrong path, Kendall is ready to jump in and save him, just as he’s done for her, but someone else beats her to it. As Zander gets into a relationship with Rosemary Hiltz (Amanda Villa), Kendall is slowly being forgotten. As relationships progress, problems arise and truth comes out, proving that despite outer appearances, everyone’s lives are a little bit cracked.
title: CRACKed
